reviews.title: HMM
reviews.comment: THIS APP IS COOL! BUT IT\'S CONFUSING! NEEDS A LOT OF FIXING. ALSO IN ORDER TO SAVE THE IMAGE YOU HAVE TO TAKE A SCREENSHOT! BOOOOOO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but now it crashes :(
reviews.comment: It was great and I loved it! But now it keeps crashing and I can\'t use it anymore :( I even tried restarting my phone and uninstalling and reinstalling the app :(
reviews.author: Mikayla Davis

reviews.title: truly amazing. app
reviews.comment: I can display. my hunny picture. anytime. the only. annoying. thing. is wen you set the wallpaper. it got glass. wallpaper. in the corner. and will not go away
reviews.author: Tanisha Freeman

reviews.title: TOO MUCH.
reviews.comment: But why does tha glass wallpaper. Have to stay. At tha top of ur phone it\'s. Really. Annoying PLEASE. FIX THIS. ISSUE \"NOW
reviews.author: Tanisha Freeman

reviews.title: Stopped working!
reviews.comment: Loved this app.  Now it won\'t even open.  Please fix.  Droid RAZR m.
reviews.author: Christine Tanner

reviews.title: Sorry bad english
reviews.comment: How to upgrade to pro version
reviews.author: Irvan Lesmana

reviews.title: Confusing advert
reviews.comment: This is only a wallpaper app.
reviews.author: Jaco Vosloo

reviews.title: Note 2
reviews.comment: I love this app....would give 5 stars if glass wallpaper title was removed!
reviews.author: Nerrisa D

reviews.title: Cool but needs update
reviews.comment: Its a very cool and nice app but it has some problems. It crushes sometimes and controls the brightness of my screen (brightest).. also something is writen on the upper left corner that stays there all the time
reviews.author: Carl Jam
